questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.
shift the equipment to another place where the AC Voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective
replace the power cord with the new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the continuity of fuse and confirm whether the fuses are blown
replace the fuses with a new one
check and confirm whether there is Input of 230 VAC is available at the Input module

videos.videoName: Video for checking the input AC

questions.question: replace the input module with a new one
check and confirm whether the output from power supply board is available.
repair / replace the power supply board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the power supply

questions.question: check and confirm whether the output of DC -DC Converter is available
repair / replace the DC-DC Converter board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the DC-DC Converter

questions.question: repair / replace the Control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video required for replacing the Control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether there is AC interference in the ECG
check whether there is any grounding issue and shift the equipment to another area. Confirm whether the problem still persists
check and confirm whether the electrode or patient cable is connected properly
reconnect the patient cable properly
open the equipment, check and confirm whether there is any dry soldering or loose connection of the ECG cable connector pin
solder the connector pin properly
check and confirm whether the keypad does not respond while pressing.
check whether there is loose connection / breakage of cable between the control board and switch control board
reconnect / replace the cables accordingly
replace the switch control with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing switch control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the print available during the ECG is being taken
check and confirm whether the paper roll is inserted
insert the paper roll properly
open the equipment, check and confirm whether there is any loose connection / breakage of cable between the control board and thermal head
reconnect / replace the cable accordingly between the control board and thermal head.
open the equipment, clean the thermal head to clear all the dirt or dust. Confirm whether the problem still persist
replace the thermal head with a new one

videos.videoName: Video required for replacing thermal head

questions.question: check and confirm whether cable not detected message appears on the display
connect the cables properly and confirm whether the problem still persists
replace the cables with a new one and confirm whether the problem still persist
replace the ECG Module with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the ECG Module

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
